text: Congratulations to Ambassador Brink for her confirmation as U.S. Ambassador to Ukraine. Her experience and leadership will be an asset for the United States as we continue to stand with Ukraine against Russia. https://t.co/mtWvyx0xPV

Today, it finally happened. We must continue to show Ukraine that America stands with them in their fight for freedom.https://t.co/o0qEM1yxEF

Congratulations to Montana’s new US Attorney.

April saw the highest number of migrants ever recorded.

I introduced the bipartisan “Putting First Responders First Act” so that first responders like Ladd won't have to pay taxes on injury-related compensation when hurt in the line of duty.

In honor of #NationalPoliceWeek, I'm calling on the Senate to pass this commonsense bill now!

Today I sat down with Heidi and Ladd Paulson from Billings. In 2002, Ladd was hit by a car while on duty as a MT police officer.

Now, the Paulsons advocate on behalf of all of our Montana heroes that serve and protect our communities. https://t.co/axxQGJS5ar

The @WHO spent the last two years acting as an arm of the Chinese Communist Party to help cover up information on COVID-19. 

Under no circumstances should @JoeBiden allow it to have control over the lives of Americans.

MT is a northern border state with a southern border problem, & our communities are directly impacted by @JoeBiden’s incompetent handling of the crisis at our southern border & rising crime.

Biden must be held accountable. Glad to work with @SenBillCassidy to make certain he is. https://t.co/G9O8j4kwgu
